descriptionHtml:
-< NEW CONVERSE MOD >-
by SalvoSoftware | Version 1.2 -

[ INFO: ]

This mod will add into Skyrim a new pair of shoes.

[ UPDATED VERSIONS: ]

1.2 - Male\'s bug fixed. (maybe)
1.1 - New colors and textures.

[ HOW TO INSTALL: ]

You simply have to select the folder of the color that you want to have and move \"textures\" and \"meshes\" folders into your \"data\" folder of Skyrim.
Now you have the mod installed, enjoy! :)

[ F.A.Q.s ] 

Q: What I\'m going to replace?
A: That\'s a nice question, the name of the item that you are going to replace is \"Shoes\", but I don\'t know what kind of shoes it is...

Q: How can I get my new pair of Converse?
A: You have to type \"coc qasmoke\" into the console, and look for clothes, I know, it\'s a  bad way, but when I will found the item\'s ID i will give you it.
(or you can take it from Barkeep)

Q: Is a very bad texture, they don\'t looks Converse!
A: I know, I worked a lot into texture.bsa to find a texture that could be replaced to make this kind of shoes, so the texture, now, is a little bad, but in the future, if you stay tuned, i will post a new version of the mod.

Q: I like that you founded a good item to make this mod, but I have a better texture, can I make another mod?
A: Yeah, of course, I\'d like that you post it into my post, so I can add the link into the description.

Q: When will you relase a stand alone version?
A: When I will have much time, now I\'m a little busy and I\'m going to holidays too, so I can\'t work so much...

Q: There is a bug with male version, how can i fix it?
A: I\'m sorry, it works good for me but someone of my friends have this bug, I don\'t know the reason, however it will certanly be fixed when I will relase the stand alone version.
author: SalvoSoftware
